title: Microsoft security advisory – June 2025 monthly rollup (AV25-333)
description: On June 10, 2025, Microsoft published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were critical updates for the following products:
products: Microsoft 365 Apps   multiple versions and platforms
Microsoft Office   multiple versions and platforms
Microsoft Sharepoint Server   multiple versions and platforms
Remote Desktop client for Windows Desktop
Windows App Client for Windows Desktop
Windows Server   multiple versions and platforms
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
